title: Companion Approval Guide
content:
Druid Grove - The two adventurers that came with Aradin would be hanging out in the Area.

Requirements/Details:

Simply talk to Elegis after the Goblin Raid

Requirements/Details:

After the Goblin Raid, there will still be some stranglers. In order to have this conversation, Nadira has to be alive. You have to save Nadira from the Bugbear and make sure she is alive. It is recommended to approach from the Goblin Gate Rooftop as approaching it from the Squirrel/Elevator are can trigger the bug
